title: Original Burger
description: Griddled sweet onion, American cheese, house pickles, drop sauce, toasted potato roll.

title: American Burger
description: Ketchup relish, fresh diced onion, lettuce, American cheese, drop sauce, toasted potato roll.

title: Chicken Burger
description: Our house-made chicken patty with shredded lettuce, pickles and garlic may served on a toasted sesame bun.

title: Veggie Burger
description: Barley-mushrooms-carrot-leek patty, American cheese, toasted potato roll.

title: Curly Fries
description: Panko-crusted, seasoned with Old Bay with a side of Drop Sauce.

title: Cheese Fries
description: Seasoned fries, cheese sauce, pickled jalapeño relish.

title: Lemon Cream Pudding
description: Tart lemon curd layered with sweet vanilla cream pudding, toasted graham cracker and meringue.

title: Pop Cans & water
description: Add coke zero, diet coke, classic coke or ginger-ale to your order.

title: Boylan’s Soda
description: Your choice of Boylan’s Root Beer or Black Cherry Soda.
